characters.name: David
characters.appearance: short, stocky, with black hair hair and blue eyes. birthmark
characters.mannerisms: Maintains eye contact and is hyper vigalant.
characters.speechPattern: casual and uses slang. But can be formal when needed
characters.background: He comes from a low class family and is working his way up. Right now he has a cooperate job, working in a tech company so he knows when to be formal. When outside work, he's more casual and laidback.
characters.goals: They want to make more money and not need to worry about it anymore
characters.values: He cares for his girlfriend and wants to ensure that she's looked after.
